name: CampNight (itch)
description:
Try to survive as long as possible by collecting wood to keep the fire alive!

Collect wood, kill enemies and loot chests to keep the fire burning so you don't freeze! You have to watch out tho, because when you're too long too far away from your fire you'll start to freeze! And the longer you survive, the more enemies will come to kill you!

Can you survive the longest and become the number one on the leaderboard?!

 

features

  • Survival
  • PvE
  • Lootchests
  • Gathering
  • & much more!
